verses.verse: Now Hiram <WH2438> <WH8676> <WH2361> king <WH4428> of TZor <WH6865> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> to David <WH1732>, and timber <WH6086> of cedars <WH730>, with masons <WH7023> and carpenters <WH2796>, to build <WH1129> <WH8800> him an house <WH1004>.

And David <WH1732> perceived <WH3045> <WH8799> that the YY <WH3068> had confirmed <WH3559> <WH8689> him king <WH4428> over Yisra'EL <WH3478>, for his kingdom <WH4438> was lifted up <WH5375> <WH8738> on high <WH4605>, because of his people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And David <WH1732> took <WH3947> <WH8799> more wives <WH802> at Yerushalayim <WH3389>: and David <WH1732> begat <WH3205> <WH8686> more sons <WH1121> and daughters <WH1323>.
Now these are the names <WH8034> of his children <WH3205> <WH8803> which he had in Yerushalayim <WH3389>; Shammua <WH8051>, and Shobab <WH7727>, Natan <WH5416>, and SHlomo <WH8010>,
And Ibhar <WH2984>, and Elishua <WH474>, and Elpalet <WH467>,
And Nogah <WH5052>, and Nepheg <WH5298>, and Japhia <WH3309>,
And Elishama <WH476>, and Beeliada <WH1182>, and Eliphalet <WH467>.

And when the Philistines <WH6430> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> that David <WH1732> was anointed <WH4886> <WH8738> king <WH4428> over all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, all the Philistines <WH6430> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> to seek <WH1245> <WH8763> David <WH1732>. And David <WH1732> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> of it, and went out <WH3318> <WH8799> against <WH6440> them.
And the Philistines <WH6430> came <WH935> <WH8804> and spread <WH6584> <WH8799> themselves in the valley <WH6010> of Refa'im <WH7497>.

And David <WH1732> enquired <WH7592> <WH8799> of 'Elohim <WH430>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Shall I go up <WH5927> <WH8799> against the Philistines <WH6430>? and wilt thou deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> them into mine hand <WH3027>? And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Go up <WH5927> <WH8798>; for I will deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> them into thine hand <WH3027>.

So they came up <WH5927> <WH8799> to Baalperazim <WH1188>; and David <WH1732> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them there. Then David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799>, 'Elohim <WH430> hath broken in <WH6555> <WH8804> upon mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> by mine hand <WH3027> like the breaking forth <WH6556> of waters <WH4325>: therefore they called <WH7121> <WH8804> the name <WH8034> of that place <WH4725> Baalperazim <WH1188>.
And when they had left <WH5800> <WH8799> their 'elohim <WH430> there, David <WH1732> gave a Mitzvah <WH559> <WH8799>, and they were burned <WH8313> <WH8735> with fire <WH784>.
And the Philistines <WH6430> yet again <WH3254> <WH8686> spread themselves abroad <WH6584> <WH8799> in the valley <WH6010>.

Therefore David <WH1732> enquired <WH7592> <WH8799> again of 'Elohim <WH430>; and 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Go not up <WH5927> <WH8799> after <WH310> them; turn away <WH5437> <WH8685> from them, and come <WH935> <WH8804> upon them over against <WH4136> the mulberry trees <WH1057>.

And it shall be, when thou shalt hear <WH8085> <WH8800> a sound <WH6963> of going <WH6807> in the tops <WH7218> of the mulberry trees <WH1057>, that then thou shalt go out <WH3318> <WH8799> to battle <WH4421>: for 'Elohim <WH430> is gone forth <WH3318> <WH8804> before <WH6440> thee to smite <WH5221> <WH8687> the host <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430>.

David <WH1732> therefore did <WH6213> <WH8799> as 'Elohim <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him: and they smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the host <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430> from Giv`on <WH1391> even to Gazer <WH1507>.
And the fame <WH8034> of David <WH1732> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> into all lands <WH776>; and the YY <WH3068> brought <WH5414> <WH8804> the fear <WH6343> of him upon all nations <WH1471>.
